mapper.insert: insert into tbl_blog( id, title, content, picture, views, appreciate, shareStatement, commentabled, published, recommend, createTime, updateTime, description, typeId, userId ) values( #{id}, #{title}, #{content}, #{picture}, #{views}, #{appreciate}, #{shareStatement}, #{commentabled}, #{published}, #{recommend}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{description}, #{typeId}, #{userId} )
mapper.update: update tbl_blog set title=#{blog.title}, content=#{blog.content}, picture=#{blog.picture}, flag=#{blog.flag}, views=#{blog.views}, appreciate=#{blog.appreciate}, shareStatement=#{blog.shareStatement}, commentabled=#{blog.commentabled}, published=#{blog.published}, description=#{blog.description}, recommend=#{blog.recommend}, updateTime=#{blog.updateTime}, typeId=#{blog.typeId} where id=#{id}
mapper.select:
select b.id, b.title, b.content, b.picture, b.views, b.appreciate, b.shareStatement, b.commentabled, b.published, b.recommend, b.createTime, b.updateTime, t.name as typeId, b.userId from tbl_blog b join tbl_type t on b.typeId=t.id
b.title like '%' #{title} '%'
and t.id = #{typeId}
and recommend=true
order by updateTime desc
